import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Grid, Menu, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react' export default class Navigation extends Component { state = { activeItem: 'bio' } handleItemClick = (e, { name }) => this.setState({ activeItem: name }) render() { const { activeItem } = this.state return ( This is an stretched grid column. This segment will always match the tab height



















































) } }
